comment: The value, by convention, of the ` lcm ` operator when either operand is 0. (Use ~ lcmcom for a left-hand 0.) (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 20-Jan-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 16-Sep-2020.)
